name: Bongo Cat Plays Royalty Free Music
name_original: Bongo Cat Plays Royalty Free Music
description:
Bongo Cat Plays Royalty Free Music is a rhythm game where you plays as bongo cat tapping to the beat of the music.

Press X to use the left hand, press M to use the right hand. Press Spacebar to start the song. 

I've always wanted to make rhythm game for so long, but I always put it off. After being lazy for 2 days straight, I decided to get up and make something at 4.30 pm. Not really what I had in mind in the beginning, but I think it's still an interesting experiment and a really good learning opportunity! 

Hope everyone have fun playing this (kinda broken) game!

Made in 5 hours for Even Weekend Game Jam 1

Bongo Cat by @StrayRogue

Background music:

"Laserpack" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
